scripts._buildInternal_CopyHtml: echo Copying HTML files && ts-node builder/html.ts
scripts._buildInternal_CopyAssets: echo Copying assets and lang files && ts-node builder/assets.ts
scripts.build: echo **** STARTING PITCHBUILD **** && npm run _buildInternal_CompileTypeScript && npm run _buildInternal_CopyHtml && npm run _buildInternal_CopyAssets && echo **** COMPLETED! You may find Pitchrome at '/pitchbuild/' ****
